docker build . 
docker-compose  build    //rebuild the docker container
docker-compose run --rm app sh -c "flake8"  //run lint
docker-compose run --rm app sh -c "django-admin startproject nameOftheDjangoProject ." // create new django project using docker-compose
docker-compose up //server start 
docker-compose run --rm app sh -c "python manage.py startapp nameOftheApp"  //create new app inside existing project

docker-compose run --rm app sh -c "python manage.py makemigrations" //Re-create the migrations files
docker-compose run --rm app sh -c "python manage.py migrate" //Apply the new migrations files 
docker-compose run --rm app sh -c "python manage.py wait_for_db && python manage.py migrate" // wait for db available and then migrate migration files
docker volume ls
docker volume rm nameOfVolumes
docker-compose run --rm app sh -c "python manage.py showmigrations"
docker-compose run --rm app sh -c "python manage.py migrate appName zero"
